Posts.Content: I had stage 2 breast cancer. Choose to have a lumpectomy. I finished with chemo and radiation five weeks ago. I want to know how many of you out there who have already lived through the first diagnosis of breast cancer, have been diagnosed again within the last 3 years with cancer. And what kind. How did you know? Did you feel bad in anyway or was it a regular check up? rg
Posts.Title: Reoccurence
